sense.gloss: lotus position (meditation and yoga posture), padmasana, sitting with legs crossed and feet placed on opposing thighs
half lotus position (meditation posture), sitting with one foot placed on the opposite thigh
x: 結跏趺坐・けっかふざ

sdata.j: あなた、↑結跏趺坐↑↓けっかふざ↓ができますか？
sdata.e: Can you sit in the Lotus position?
